content.question: Which of the following best explains the contribution of the lac operon to the metabolic efficiency of a bacterial cell?

choices.label: Expression of the lacI gene requires lactose.
RNA polymerase is rapidly degraded by the product of the lacP locus.
The repressor binds to DNA only when the cellular concentration of glucose is low.
The lacZ gene is highly expressed only when lactose is available.

content.answer: The lacZ gene is highly expressed only when lactose is available.
